snippet.title: Islands & Trains Teaser Trailer - Relaxing Sandbox Builder coming 2023
snippet.description:
WISHLIST on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1957760/Islands__Trains/
Islands & Trains is a very relaxing sandbox builder game.
Build tiny dioramas with just one shed or idyllic villages with dense forests.
Lay your own railroad on top of your beloved island. Place animals in the countryside and just watch & enjoy your peaceful creation. Get lost in finding the most perfect place for all these little pieces.

We're 2 only people working on this game and we would like to show you a little video of what you can do in our tiny game 😌

Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1957760/Islands__Trains/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Just_Game_Dev
